intro.greetings: Hello, my name is Henrique! I am a
intro.description: Specialist in responsive web development, automations, payment integrations, chatbots, APIs, and dedicated to creating a creative solution for your technological needs!

header.left_header: 4+ years of experience working with software development

right_header.sub_header: Discover the best services I offer, always focused on the success of your project.

services.description: Development of lightweight, elegant, and responsive interfaces, using the best tools on the market!
Scalable and optimized APIs following REST standards, with Swagger documentation and data validation!
Experience with the most widely used tools in the market; Docker, Git, Swagger, Github, Bitbucket, Heroku, Vercel, and much more!

cards.title: Bakery Ecommerce
cards.description: E-commerce integrated with Stripe payment API, the website aims to present its products and prices beautifully and concisely to the customer.

cards.title: Travel Landing Page
cards.description: Website for a travel agency, with responsive design aimed at providing the best possible user experience.

cards.title: Google Sheets Integrated API
cards.description: API integrated with Google Sheets, executing all necessary CRUD operations to integrate with an application of your choice!

cards.title: Petshop REST API
cards.description: REST API built with NestJS (Framework that facilitates the creation of Express APIs quickly and organized) with JWT authentication using MongoDB as the database.

cards.title: Auth0 Multitenant Fullstack App
cards.description: Fullstack application with multitenant login using Auth0. The application allows participation in various teams through a multitenant login system.

cards.title: AI Images Generator | Freepik API
cards.description: AI image generator chatbot using the Freepik API or NovitaAI. The chatbot includes a subscription feature with payment integration using the Mercado Pago API.

cards.title: Ifood x Shipday Integration
cards.description: Integration between Ifood and Shipday platforms using a webhook to connect both applications through their respective APIs.

cards.title: Typescript Selenium | Webscraper
cards.description: Web scraper using Selenium WebDriver and TypeScript. The application searches for product information on Mercado Livre through an API call that initiates the search. Filters can be set in the request body.

action.main: Start developing the solution you need for your business to reach new heights now!
